document.content: Thus, according to the present invention, the rate of defective liquid lenses can be minimized.
document.title: APPAREIL ET PROCD D'ASSEMBLAGE D'UNE FACE AVANT AVEC UNE LENTILLE DE LIQUIDE

document.content: Accordingly, it is apparent that the illuminating device shown in FIG. 17 is better than that shown in FIG. 9, in terms of the light output values and the brightness uniformity.
document.title: LENTILLE DE FRESNEL ET DEL L'UTILISANT
